name: Rift (itch) (LoganBritt135)
description:
Enter the world of the Rift.

Above the baren land of what used to be a kingdom ran by Queen Renem, a rift has opened and absored her and her kingdom. 

Enter the Rift, rescue the people of the kingdom and return them to the land that once was the kingdom so they can rebuild. 

Use "WASD" or the arrow keys to move, collect the citizens, push away orange forms and avoid blue forms in the 2-Dimensional realm known as the Rift.
